privacy.content_usa:
PomeloX Privacy Policy (USA Version)

Effective Date: September 3, 2025
Version: v1.1

Service Provider: American Promotion Company, Inc.
Address: 8988 CAMINITO FRESCO, LA JOLLA, CA 92037

1. Policy Overview

We comply with applicable US federal and state privacy laws, including the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA), and Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA).

2. Information We Collect

Personal Information:
â€¢ Name/nickname, avatar, school email/phone
â€¢ School/grade/major, referral codes
â€¢ Identity verification results

Activity & Travel Information:
â€¢ Flight/arrival information, pickup reservations
â€¢ Activity registrations, check-in/check-out records

Volunteer Service Information:
â€¢ Check-in/out records, hour tracking
â€¢ Volunteer coordination feedback

Device & Usage Information:
â€¢ Device identifiers, IP addresses
â€¢ Operation/security/crash logs
â€¢ Cookies/local storage data

3. How We Use Your Information

With Your Consent:
â€¢ Account creation and management
â€¢ AI Q&A services
â€¢ Activity notifications and reminders

For Contract Performance:
â€¢ Activity registration and volunteer management
â€¢ Airport pickup and transportation services
â€¢ Local discount services

For Legitimate Interests:
â€¢ Service improvement and user experience
â€¢ Fraud prevention and security
â€¢ Technical support and maintenance

4. Information Sharing

Third-Party Services (limited scope):
â€¢ Gmail SMTP: Email delivery
â€¢ Cloudflare R2: File storage
â€¢ Firebase FCM: Push notifications

We do not sell your personal information.

5. Your Privacy Rights

Under California Law (CCPA/CPRA):
â€¢ Right to Know: What personal information we collect
â€¢ Right to Access: Request copies of your personal information
â€¢ Right to Delete: Request deletion of personal information
â€¢ Right to Correct: Correct inaccurate personal information
â€¢ Right to Opt-Out: Opt out of sale/sharing (we don't sell)
â€¢ Right to Non-Discrimination: Equal service regardless of privacy choices

To exercise your rights:
Email us at info@americanpromotioncompany.com or contact us through the app.

6. Children's Privacy (COPPA Compliance)

â€¢ Under 13: We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13
â€¢ 13-17: Parental guidance recommended
â€¢ Enhanced protection measures for minors

7. Data Security

Technical Safeguards:
â€¢ AES-256 encryption for sensitive data
â€¢ HTTPS encrypted transmission
â€¢ Access controls and authentication
â€¢ 24/7 security monitoring

Operational Safeguards:
â€¢ Employee access on need-to-know basis
â€¢ Regular security training and audits
â€¢ Data access logging
â€¢ Incident response procedures

8. Data Retention and Storage

â€¢ Location: United States and other regions
â€¢ Retention: Minimum time necessary for purposes
â€¢ Disposal: Secure deletion or anonymization

9. Contact Us

For privacy-related questions:
â€¢ Email: info@americanpromotioncompany.com
â€¢ Data Protection Officer: dev@americanpromotioncompany.com
â€¢ Address: 8988 CAMINITO FRESCO, LA JOLLA, CA 92037
â€¢ Business Hours: Monday-Friday 9:00-18:00 (Beijing Time)

10. Policy Updates

We may update this policy and will notify you of material changes through in-app notifications, email, or website notices.

This policy is governed by applicable US law and the laws of California.
